The claim is about a photograph showing: exposure shot of lightning striking a tree.
The expert: s verdict also mentions that the image has been widely reposted on the internet with misleading captions, leading to misinformation about its authenticity.
The creator of the image: Darren Pearson, explains that the original photo used for the composite was taken at the Presidio in San Diego, CA, and the lightning bolt was added as an idea from his roommate.
